abstract: Checking in on the documentary "Fires of Faith."
snippet: Checking in on the documentary "Fires of Faith."
lead_paragraph: It's perhaps the most beloved (and, for many, most sacred) book ever published in the West, but oh, the birth pangs. BYUtv has been exploring the creation of the King James Bible in "Fires of Faith," a well-made three-part documentary (also viewable on the channel's Web site) that concludes Sunday night.
